```{r}
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
df <- list()
```

```{r}
df[[1]] <- readxl::read_excel(
  "../../3_Article_Screen/3_3_Meta/CodeBook_SCOLS_v0.0.2.xlsx"
) %>%
  dplyr::slice(-1)
```

```{r}
df[[2]] <- df[[1]] %>%
  dplyr::filter(
    Measure == "PCOR",
    Overview == 0,
    Codable == 1,
    SCO == 1,
    LS == 1
  )


```

```{r}
df[[3]] <- df[[1]] %>%
  dplyr::filter(
    Measure == "COR",
    Overview == 0,
    Codable == 1,
    SCO == 1,
    LS == 1
  )
```
